channel.title: HJS Educational Funding
channel.description: Recent content on HJS Educational Funding

item.title: Donate
item.description: Donate online now Funds collected by HJS Educational Funding is to provide financial assistance to socially and economically disadvantaged students in primary, secondary schools in coastal areas in India and give scholarships to poor students pursuing higher education in India to improve their prospects for better job opportunities. Recipients of Scholarships will be required to submit progress reports of their studies, including their grade transcripts attested by the school registrar and their advisors/professors.

item.title: About us
item.description: About the foundation Halimbi Jamal Shaikh (HJS) Educational Funding was established to promote education among economically and socially disadvantaged Indian Minority communities and their children who are unable to pay fees and pursue their education to improve their economic and educational conditions. These communities are economically disadvantage groups who hail from Kumta and neighboring villages. Kumta Taluk and its neighboring villages are located on the west coast of Karnataka 500 miles south of Mumbai and 100 miles south of Goa.
